item.title: Pumpkin littering, 3rd November
item.description:

item.title: Fly tipped mattress on side of 6 Abery Street, 3rd November
item.description:
Today someone dumped their old mattress on the side wall of our property 6 Abery Street. It's not our mattress, the property is empty and we had all our mattresses collected by Greenwich council bulky waste a couple of weeks ago

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abery Street, Plumstead, London

item.title: Littered street, 3rd November
item.description:
After the bin men come to collect the rubbish they leave the road super littered, could we please get someone to come and clear up the litter from the road, we have a load of empty bottles, empty water bottles and general litter in the roads and on the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Wellington Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
